abstract.description: The detailed description of a document.

agencyAcronym.description: An abbreviation of the agency name.

agencyName.description: Full name of the Federal Agency.

allowLateComment.description: Some agencies will accept comments after the due date.

attachmentCount.description: Number of attachments associated with a document.

attachments.description: Additional files associated with this document

cfr.description: A Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) Citation Number exists for each regulation referring to the rules published in the Federal Register by executive departments and agencies of the Federal Government.

comment.description: The text of the submitter's comment.

commentDueDate.description: Date and time when the period for the public to comment ends.

commentStartDate.description: Date and time when the period for the public to comment begins.

docketId.description: A unique identifier established for a docket.

docketType.description: A Docket Type is either Rulemaking or Non-Rulemaking. A Rulemaking docket includes the type of regulation that establishes a rule. While a Non-Rulemaking docket does not include a rule.

documentId.description: A unique identifier established for a document.

documentStatus.description: Identifies whether the document is Posted on or Withdrawn from Regulations.gov.

documentSubtype.description: A secondary classification of a document.
